sentence.text: BACKGROUND Previous research found that dolichol-linked oligosaccharide biosynthetic process is associated with cervical cancer, but the role of ALG3 in breast cancer was still unknown.
MATERIAL AND METHODS The expression of dolichol-linked oligosaccharide biosynthetic process in breast carcinoma tissues was determined by immunochemistry.
RESULTS There was an increased expression of dolichol-linked oligosaccharide biosynthetic process in breast cancer tissues compared to normal breast tissues (pAAAA0.05).

dolichol-linked oligosaccharide biosynthetic process expression was significantly increased in cancer samples with advanced stages (stage III/IV) compared with those in the early stages of disease (stage I/II) (pAAAA0.05).
The staining intensity of dolichol-linked oligosaccharide biosynthetic process was significantly correlated to the tumor grade (grades 2-3 versus 1, pAAAA0.05).
